description.value:
You know how to quickly break down an item, saving only the most useful components. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.DfvGFDHV7pYIT7ct]{Salvage an Item} of the type you chose with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Specialty Crafting}, you can choose to spend only ten minutes. If you do so, attempt a single Crafting check against a Very Hard DC for the item’s level.

On a success, add half of the item’s Salvage Maximum value or your Day value on Table 1: Spending Limit, whichever is less. On a failure, you gain no materials. Either way, the item is destroyed.
